FuncDef: This command is applicable only to LAC. MRRU option is an indication that the session is of MLPPPoX type. The 7750 SR LAC will never initiate MRRU option in LCP negotiation process. However, it will respond to MRRU negotiation request by the client.
ExtraInfo: Default: no accept-mrru to The MRRU option in LCP will not be negotiated by LAC.
